exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat Unable to unify "neg (S (S (n + 0)))" with "predZ (addneg (neg 0) n)".
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros n m. unfold addZ. destruct n. - destruct m. + simpl. reflexivity. + simpl. reflexivity. - destruct m. + simpl. reflexivity. + simpl. rewrite <- tech_add_neg_posZ. reflexivity.
